ResourceHeader.ResourceName: KITDALEN GEOS-2 : ULF Search Coil Ground Based Data Level 1 (RFF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This Level 1 dataset contains magnetic field components depending on time, given in NWV Coordinate System in TM counts units. The NWV Coordinate System is defined as follows: the Z component is vertical outward, the X component is towards North and Y is towards West. Correspondence with VDH system is: V=Z, D=-Y, H=X. The dataset is in RFF format.

Parameter.Name: ULF magnetic field measured at Kitdalen ground station
Parameter.Description: ULF magnetic field measured at Kitdalen ground station (in coordination with GEOS-2) in the range (0.05 - 11.63 Hz) and recorded with a sample rate of 23.25 Hz. The typical sensitivities are : 0.1 gamma/Hz at 0.1 Hz and 0.0002 gamma/Hz at 10 Hz. The dynamic range of the telemetry is 72 dB.
